summary: A shy, introverted young girl takes a summer job at a seaside resort in Wales. She finds the staff, the owners and patrons unlike anyone she has ever met before.
cast: Elizabeth Edmonds|Sue Wallace|Geraldine Griffiths|Karen Meagher|Maggie Wilkinson|Ron Bain|Alun Lewis|Robert Blythe|Roy Heather|Peter Doran|Arwen Holm|Sion Tudor Owen|Robert Gwilym|Mostyn Evans|Paul Haley|Margo Jenkins|Jerry Brooke
title: Experience Preferred... But Not Essential
